document.title: Close Your Legs & Open Your Ming (For Ladies Only)
document.abstract: African-American females are confronted with a number of obstacles that are hindering their development as women. In this presentation, participants will have an honest and in depth conversation on how to develop healthy and lasting relationships from a man's point of view. It will examine today's images of young black females, give a brief overview of the present status of the black family, understand the self-destructive behavior that exists, and provide solutions that will assist in rebuilding lasting and loving relationships.

field.name: location
field.value: Carolyn P. Brown Memorial University Center
